text: Slaughter King is the second mixtape by Atlanta-based rapper 21 Savage. It was released on December 1, 2015. ==Release and promotion== On December 2, 2015, the music video "Dirty K" was released. The mixtape was re-released on all streaming platforms on May 5, 2016 along with The Slaughter Tape and singles "Red Opps" and "One Foot". ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2015 mixtape albums Category:21 Savage albums
title: Slaughter King
